description.long_description: A hardwood style with a fresh look. These men's basketball-inspired shoes have a washed canvas upper contrasted by smooth 3-Stripes. They ride on a durable, vulcanized-look rubber cupsole.
description.copy:
• Textile and Synthetic
  • Made in USA or Imported
  • Rubber sole
  • Regular fit; Washed canvas upper
  • Rubber cupsole provides excellent traction
  • Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite Float sockliner

description.long_description: These shoes re-create old-school basketball sneakers with a modern feel. They have a clean mid-cut hoops look in a mix of leather and mesh.
description.copy:
• 100% Faux Leather
  • Imported
  • Rubber sole
  • Shaft measures approximately 4.25" from arch
  • Heel measures approximately 1.25"
  • Mid-cut fashion sneaker with faux-leather upper featuring tonal three-stripes branding and vulcanized outsole

Ideal for runs up to 3 miles, the Nike Free RN 5.0 returns to its roots as a natural motion shoe. An updated flex groove pattern and modified midsole foam provides more flexibility than its predecessor, creating a barefoot sensation with every step. At the upper, breathable and stretchy mesh moves with your foot, while synthetic suede overlays provide stable support.

Benefits

  • Stretch upper designed to fit like a second skin.
  • Low foam density lets your foot feel connected to the ground.
  • Heel-to-toe grooves allow multi-directional flexibility.
  • Asymmetrical lacing system is placed on the side to relieve pressure on your instep.
  • Bootie construction integrates the tongue to provide a snug, seamless fit.
  • The absence of a heel counter gives freedom to your heel area while providing lockdown.
  • Sockliner is designed to give your foot a close, connected feel to the ground.
  • Double hot-knife cuts on the outsole and side of the midsole flex to give optimal flexibility with every step.
  • Rubber pods on the forefoot and heel enhance traction.

Product Details

  • Weight: 8.34 oz. (men's size 10)
  • Last: MR-46
  • Offset: 6mm (14mm forefoot, 20mm heel)
  • Shown: Red/White
  • Model: 2014
description.long_description: Ideal for runs up to 3 miles, this natural motion shoe features a breathable, stretchy mesh upper that fits like a second skin. Synthetic suede overlays provide stable support.

description.long_description: These shoes are perfect for casual wear or casual sports use. They are perfectly breathable, making them a great choice for casual basketball games, too.
